results.title: Who Are the Republicans Opposing McCarthy’s Speaker Bid?
results.abstract: The rebellion has been led by a small but vocal group of ultraconservative Republicans. But there are other, less-known defectors who could help scuttle the G.O.P. leader’s candidacy.

multimedia.caption: Representative Kevin McCarthy must secure near unanimity among Republicans to win the speaker’s job.
multimedia.copyright: Mikayla Whitmore for The New York Times

results.title: George Santos Comes to Washington. It Could Be Awkward.
results.abstract: On the first day of the 118th Congress, the representative-elect, a Republican who has made false claims about his background, education and finances, will bring his saga to Capitol Hill.

multimedia.caption: George Santos is under the shadow of active investigations by federal and local prosecutors into potential criminal activity during his two congressional campaigns.
multimedia.copyright: Alejandra Villa Loarca/Newsday RM, via Getty Images

results.title: Damar Hamlin of Buffalo Bills in Critical Condition After Collapsing During N.F.L. Game
results.abstract: Hamlin, a 24-year-old safety, went into cardiac arrest after being hit, but his heartbeat was restored by medical personnel, the Bills said. The game against the Cincinnati Bengals was postponed.
results.byline: By Emmanuel Morgan and Ken Belson

multimedia.caption: An ambulance carrying Damar Hamlin left the field at Paycor Stadium during the game between the Bills and Bengals on Monday night.
